data.title: Government Spending & Budget Transparency Reporting
data.meta_description: Spending Tracker is dedicated to transparency on budgeting, the national debt, and government spending. Sign up today for custom updates on what your elected officials are doing.
data.text:
How It Works

Members of Congress take countless votes every year, many of which add new spending.

SpendingTracker.org automatically aggregates the new spending contained in each bill, according to official estimates, to create each Member of Congress's total "number" based on what they have voted for.

Why It Matters

Nearly every elected official and candidate promises to spend the people's money responsibly, but rising debt and historically high spending shows that these promises are usually forgotten.

We believe that accountability matters, so we created SpendingTracker.org to reveal who is voting for what â€“ as it happens.
